item.title: Displaylink on Arch Linux
item.description: Using Displaylink on Arch Linux. If, like me, your company has chosen DisplayLink to connect to your big fat 29” monitor, or to connect to TV in meeting room, and you use linux you are probably not very (at all) pleased with that choice ! In my team, 95% of the devs are using Ubuntu as there linux distrib and the Displaylink driver is not really working. I’ve switch to Arch Linux this week end !
